note.snippet: nijjalo deso, ‘‘jaṅgalo nijjale dese, tiliṅgo pisite thiya’’nti

note.original: ‘‘jagannāthā pubbabhāge kaṇhātīrantaraṃ sive kaliṅgadeso saṃvutto’’ ityuttadese (thomanidhi)

note.snippet: Milakkhadeso so vutto, majjhabhūmi tato paraṃ

note.original: nagariyo vā pattanaṃ (amara 1.2.1) pakkhe pattanasāhacariyā napuṃsakattaṃ. (cintāmaṇiṭīkā 1.2.1)

note.snippet: kusambassa isino assamato avidūre māpitattāti eke
kathitaṃ, yaṃ ‘‘pamadavana’’nti vuccati, pamadavanaṃ nāma upakārikāsannihitaṃ vā purasannihitaṃ vā antepurocitaṃ, yatra antepurasahito eva rājā viharati, nāññajanappaveso
deso. Ali sakhā indo etthāti alindo, ‘‘gehekadese alindo, paghāṇo paghaṇobhave’’ti

note.original: rassantā ca, sikhāyaṃ vaḷabhiyaṃ cūḷeti ruddo (cintāmaṇiṭīkā 12.15)

note.snippet: ‘‘tīhi, bhikkhave, ṭhānehi jambudīpakā manussā uttarakuruke manusse adhiggaṇhanti deve ca tāvatiṃse. Katamehi tīhi, sūrā satimanto idha brahmacariyavāso’’ti
yuge, ‘‘dārā pume bahutte ca, daṃ kalatre napuṃsake’’ti
to, ‘‘vayo bālyādi pakkhī ca, yobbanañca vayo kvacī’’ti
gatiyaṃ, to. Pamāṇappakaraṇato vitatañjaliyevāyaṃ kavīhi icchito. Sampuṭañjali panāyaṃ, pasāritasahitā
thanassa agge cūcukaṃ, napuṃsake. ‘‘Cūcuko so kucānana’’nti
saddena itthikaṭiyā pacchābhāgo, sesadvayena kaṭisāmaññaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ, vuttañca ‘‘pacchā nitambo thīkaṭyā, jaghanaṃ tu puro bhave’’ti
saddo cettha bījepi, aṇḍakosoti samuditampi kosassa nāmaṃ, ‘‘kukkuṭacchāpakasseva aṇḍakosamhā’’ti
Nābhiyā adhobhāgo vatthi nāma, so dvīsu. Vatthi muttapuṭaṃ. ‘‘Muttāsayapuṭo vatthi’’riti
pana medādīnamekatthatā dīpitā, vuttañhi tattha ‘‘medo tu vapā vasā’’ti
addhahāro, māṇavako, ekāvalī, nakkhattamālādayo hārabhedā ca saṅgayhanti
hi vuttaṃ. Koseyyameva dhotaṃ paṭṭuṇṇaṃ nāma, vuttañca ‘‘paṭṭuṇṇaṃ dhotakoseyya’’nti
saddena cettha phalaṃ vuttaṃ, ‘‘rukkhādīnaṃ phalaṃ sassa’’nti
Tantato aciramāharitaṃ vatthaṃ. Anāhataṃ, nippavāṇi, tantakaṃpyatra. Vuttañca ‘‘anāhataṃ nippavāṇi, tantakañca navambare’’ti
saddo itthī. ‘‘Dasā vatyamavatthāyaṃ, vatthaṃse bahumhi dvisū’’ti
soce, karaṇe yu, ‘‘sināne’’ti sattamyantaṃ padaṃ. Dvayaṃ kulyādinā
Pāyaso, vakadhūpo, siriveṭṭhopyatra. ‘‘Sirivāse paramanne ca, pāyaso sammato pume’’ti
‘‘padānaṃ sandhi vatticchāto, na samāsantaragesū’’ti vuttepi gāthābhāvato chandohānibhayā visandhi. Yattha pana gāthāyampi
visandhi ‘‘dhammasaṃvaṇṇanāya’ntiādimāhā’’tyādīsu, tattha kathanti? ‘‘Na samāsantaraṅgesū’’ti imassāniccattā tatthāpi na doso, ‘‘nena niddiṭṭhamanicca’’nti hi paribhāsitaṃ

nāma bhave, ekasseva hi kattuno pakativikatisaṅkhātāvatthāvasena dvittaṃ, vatticchāvasena liṅgasaṅkhyāvibhattibhedañca hoti, yathā – manussā yakkhabhattaṃ ahesuṃ, sattappakaraṇāni abhidhammo nāma bhavanti, devadatto rajjaṃ pāpuṇātīti. Yatra hi pakatiyā vā vikatiyā vāti dvinnampi vuttatā siyā, tatra vācako pakatiyāyeva saṅkhyaṃ gaṇhāti, netarassa tannissitabhāvenāppadhānato
ti hi nikāyantarikānaṃ laddhi. Yasmiṃ pana rājini asesā sāmantā paṇamanti, so adhissarākhyo
Tatrāyaṃ tavānuggatena pavuddho pāsādataravo viya attānañcocchindissatīti saṅkāyaṃ janitāyaṃ snehabhattiñcāpanayati. Abhibhavanañcopādayati
aṭavisahāyo mittaṃ. Tadapi sahajjaṃ, pākataṃ, kittimañceti tividhaṃ. ‘‘Liṅge sabhāve pakati, porāmaccādiyonisu. Tiliṅgaṃ guṇasāmyepī’’ti
pana chakkaṇṇopi paṭikkhitto. Vuttañhi tattha ‘‘achakkaṇṇo, yo tatiyādyagocaro’’ti
Sattuno vā pakatīhi sandhāya yo tena viggaho, sattuneva vā yo sandhiviggahasamudāyahetuko

note.original: balavatā arinā ucchijjamānassa hīnasattino yaṃ balavadhammavijayisamāsayanaṃ (byākhyāsudhā 1.8.18)

note.snippet: vaṇṇavikāro. ‘‘Raho nidhuvane cāpi, raho guyhe napuṃsaka’’nti
assu, niggahītāgamo ca. Dvinnaṃ pana kumbhānaṃ majjhimaṃ vidu nāma
itthī. Aṇipi, ‘‘sīmāssikkhaggakīlesu, aṇī āṇī ime dvisū’’ti

note.original: pādehi ajati ī, rasso ca padājiṃ (cintāmaṇiṭīkā 18.66)

note.snippet: dittiyaṃ, ṇvu. Tanuttaṃ, daṃsanaṃ, jagaropyatra. ‘‘Jagaro kaṅkaṭo yogo, sannāho ca uracchado’’ti
Anīkinī ca tāsantu, dasa akkhobhinī mata’’nti
pume payogo. ‘‘Sarā vāpo dhanu itthī, tuṇatā tiṇatāpice’’ti
pūraṇe, curādi, nadādi. ‘‘Tūṇo nisaṅgo tūṇiro, upāsaṅgo ca vāṇadhi’’riti
pana ‘‘vīrapānaṃ tu yaṃ pānaṃ, jāte bhāvini vā raṇe’’ti
Pajjaṃ maraṇe. Kālo atītādi, tassa kiriyā, ‘‘kālo ghasati bhūtānī’’ti

note.original: ‘‘yuddhe yodhesu sūresu sahassaṃ katta (khaṇḍa) muddhasu tadāvesā kabandho tu eko’muddhā kriyāndhito’’ti kabandhalakkhaṇaṃ

note.snippet: Te tattha mante ganthetvā, okkākaṃ tadupāgamu’’nti
Bhikkhuādikā imā catasso parisā nāma. Bhikkhanasīlatādīhi bhikkhu. ‘‘Uddissa ariyā tiṭṭhanti, esā ariyāna yācanā’’ti
tismā u, caru pume. ‘‘Habyapāke caru pumā’’ti
vutto. Kaṭṭhato nibbatto pākatikova aggi kaṭṭhaggi nāmāti
yathā ‘‘desetu bhagavā dhammaṃ, desetu sugato dhamma’’nti
saddo pana mukharahiteyeva vattati. ‘‘Cetiyamāyatane buddha-bimbe coddissapādape’’ti
Saṃyame yamarāje ca, yamake tu yamaṃ tisū’’ti
naṅgalalekhā sītā nāma. ‘‘Sītā naṅgalalekhā ca, divagaṅgā ca jānakī’’ti
sakatthe ko. ‘‘Pulliṅgo sākamattasmiṃ, siggu sobhañjanepi ce’’ti

note.original: madaṃ sandate pisodarādi (cintāmaṇiṭīkā 19.43) madaṃ mudaṃ vā sandate… visodarādi (byākhyāsudhāṭīkā)

note.snippet: gamo ca. ‘‘Sattyaṃ nivāraṇe tittiyaṃ, pariyattaṃ yathicchite’’ti

note.original: pasaṃsāyaṃ rūpapaccayo iti subhū (cintāmaṇiṭīkā) pasaṃsāyaṃ rūpaṃ (pāṇini 5.3.66)

note.snippet: pana cāmīkarādīnipi suvaṇṇasāmaññe paṭhati, siṅgī pana visese. Vuttañhi tattha ‘‘alaṅkārasuvaṇṇaṃ yaṃ, siṅgīkanakamiccaya’’nti
pusaddassadvinnampi vācakatādaṭṭhabbātyeke, taṃ ‘‘nāgo sīsakayogiṭṭha-vappāṇi tipu piccaṭa’’nti
nivāse, cho, vacchassāyeva gāviyā tanutthe nipātanā taro
pariyāyassa sambhavato ‘‘uraṇī tu ajī ajā’’ti vuttaṃ, vakkhati hi anekatthavagge ‘‘ummāre eḷako aje’’ti
Dvayaṃ indacālakhye kapaṭe. Mayena asurena sure vañcayituṃ

note.original: manissa jūka (ṇvādi 215) uṇādivuttiyaṃ 4.77 sutte ca passitabbaṃ

note.snippet: pana ante tayo ca uttarapadībhūtā, taṃ yathā – tena samo’yaṃ

note.original: amū nibhādayo uttarapadaṭṭhā eva sadisavacanā vāccaliṅgā siyuṃ yathā ‘‘pitunibho putto, mātunibhā kaññā, devanibhama- pacca’’miti, byākhyāsudhā 2.10.37

note.snippet: tathā cāgamo ‘‘kadambakoṭare jātā, tena kādambarī matā’’ti
Yo phalapākāvasāne marati, so kadalīdhaññādiko osadhi nāma bhave, oso dhīyate yassaṃ
Jambu ca. Lokato eva phalepi vattamānā harīṭakyādayo sabhāvato itthiyaṃ bhavanti
vidārī aṃsumatī gambhariyādayo mūle, pupphepi saliṅgā
Saṇḍilyo, selusopi. ‘‘Munippabhede mālūre, saṇḍilyo pādapantare, naṭe bille ca seluso’’ti
ddo. Tiriṭo, sāvaropi. ‘‘Sāvaro aparādhe ca, lodde pāpe ca kathyate’’
Kuvalaṃ, phenilaṃ, sovīrampi. ‘‘Sotañjane tu sovīraṃ, kañjike badarepi ce’’ti
maṇḍale, ali, assi. ‘‘Picchilā pūraṇī mocā, thirāyu simbalī dvisū’’ti
gatisuddhiyaṃ. Gāyattī, bālatanayopi. ‘‘Gāyattī khadire itthī, chandasipi chaḷakkhare’’ti
Kuṭajassa phale klīvaṃ, kaliṅgaṃ thī tu nāriya’’nti
yu. Assi. Akkavho, vasuko, apphoṭo, mandāro, akkapaṇṇopi. ‘‘Pume akkavho apphoṭo, vanamālyaparājite’’ti
āvaraṇicchāsu, atha vā ‘‘satā’’ti ca ‘‘āvarī’’ti ca dve nāmāni tassā. ‘‘Satamūlī bahusutā-bhīru indīvarī varī’’ti
sakatthe ko ca. ‘‘Madhuyaṭṭhikā’’tipi pāṭho, vuttañca ‘‘madhukaṃ klītakaṃ yaṭṭhi-madhukaṃ madhuyaṭṭhikā’’ti
gatisaddesu, ṇu, kapilā vuttā. Dvijā, hareṇū, kontī, bhasmagandhanīpi. ‘‘Hareṇu so kalāyepi, reṇukāyaṃ thiyaṃ bhave’’ti
tathā ca ‘‘koveraṃ bhāsuraṃ kuṭṭhaṃ, pāribhābyaṃ gadāhvaya’’nti
Aññatthe iro, konto ca, nāḷikero. Lāṅgalīpi. ‘‘Lāṅgalī nāḷikere ca, sirapāṇimhi lāṅgalī’’ti
Vārāhaṃ pisitaṃ bālyaṃ, rocanaṃ sedanaṃ garū’’ti
avayave, i, pesi, ‘‘pesiyaṃ pattabhede ca, koso pumeva icchito’’ti

note.original: ucyate ogho uca samavāye ghau nipātanā cassa gho (cintāmaṇiṭīkā 15.39)

note.snippet: Pakkhisīho, uḷūtīso, vajiratuṇḍo, sudhāharo, suvaṇṇapakkho, bhujagāsanopi
Meghesu gajjamānesu, gabbhaṃ gaṇhanti tā tadā’’ti
dhāraṇe, i, saññāyaṃ ko, ‘‘malliko haṃsabhede ca, tiṇasūle ca mallike’’ti
Dārado vacchanābho ca, visabhedā ime navā’’ti
majjhadīgho. Tiriyalekhāya citaṃ dvijapadehi yuttaṃ, tathā gaṇṭhibhi byāpitaṃ bindubhideva yaṃ ghanatarehi, taṃ kāḷakūṭaṃ. Idañca puthumālināmassāsurassa soṇitamhā eva asurasamaye
nā lavaṇodo, dadhyudo, ghatodo, ucchurasodo, madirodo, sādudako cāti ime satta mahaṇṇavavisesā bhavanti
Tipādena mahato sadā agādhajalassa padmaṭṭhānassa ca padmasuññassa ca yogyatāya nāmaṃ
yu. Dvayaṃ surakhāte, aporise devanimmiteti bhāvo, soṇḍeiccaññe. ‘‘Akhāto devakhātako’’ti
